title: Useful QOL Ideas
body:
We got a lot of QOL items added with the recent Farm Merchant's Dwelling project being added, but I think there are some more things that could be implemented to further add to the QOL.

If you like these ideas, please bump to help try to get them added.

1. An item that works similarly to the Prismapump or Basket of Seeds, except for normal blocks. Having to place things like slabs for a pumpkin farm or sea lanterns for a potato farm is fairly time consuming. This item, whatever it's named, will place a row of blocks until it hits an obstacle.


2. Region Delete tool. It may be quite easy to place blocks now, but removing them is something completely different. This tool will allow players to select a specific region, then delete the selected region. Things like chests and item frames can be exempt to make sure valuable items aren't deleted.


3. Personal Compactor. Just a plain Personal Compactor, no fancy numbers or anything. This item will work similarly to a personal compactor 4000/5000/6000, except instead of compacting items into their enchanted form, items will be compacted into their block form. This would make it so it is possible for wheat to automatically be compacted into enchanted hay bales, as well as being a good item for beginners to use to compact ores they mine early on in the game.


4. Make the last version of Euclid's wheat hoe cheaper. No one in their right mind would get the last version of Euclid's Wheat hoe. Every other crop-specific hoe has a last version that is significantly cheaper.


Spoiler: Reasoning



This doesn't necessarily mean just the amount of coins it takes to craft, but the amount of raw items it takes as well. Every other crop-specific hoe needs around 6.5 million raw items or less. The Pythagorean Potato hoe needs 6.5 million normal potatoes, the Turing Sugar Cane hoe needs 6.5 million sugarcane, the Newton Nether Wart hoe needs 6.5 million nether wart, and the Gauss Carrot hoe only needs around 5.2 million. The price of these hoes varies, but it's usually around 14.5 million for the cheapest (Sugar Cane), and around 21 million for the most expensive (Nether Wart). I would say that's a fair price considering hoe good they are. Now, I would say Euclid's Wheat hoe is certainly not fairly priced. It needs over 47 million wheat. On top of that, it requires tightly-tied hay bales, which require enchanted hay bales, which are very difficult to get as of right now since there is no way to automatically compact wheat into enchanted hay bales. To get all those materials, it costs at least 250 million coins if the enchanted hay bales are bought cheap.




Thanks for reading

title: [GUIDE] SkyBlock Achievements Guide [WIP]
body:
Greetings, mortals.

This guide will attempt to help you in your journey to maxing every Achievement in the game SkyBlock!


Spoiler: Why I am qualified to make this thread



I'm really not, I don't even play SkyBlock and I just got bored so take this with a grain of salt and correct me if I say anything incorrect.


This guide will be split into two sections - Challenge and Tiered Achievements. Challenge Achievements require you to do a specific action once, whereas Tiered Achievements require you to grind for a specific stat goal (such as, let's say, Combat Level 25).

In total, you can gain 1,700 Achievement Points (AP) from maxing SkyBlock. These Points are spread out over 195 different Achievements (some Challenge, some Tiered).

Challenge Achievements


Spoiler: 5 AP






Spoiler: Your Big Break



Survive an entire SkyBlock year without dying.
This one is the easiest SkyBlock achievement to get as you can just AFK the entire thing, or not even play SkyBlock for the year.





Spoiler: Higher Than A Rabbit



Wear the Spider Boots.
You can buy these off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (String Collection VIII).





Spoiler: Happy Holidays



Collect all 20 White Gifts on the Jerry Island.
This Achievement can easily be obtained during the Winter Event using Ender Pearls, a Grappling Hook and a Gift Compass.





Spoiler: It Never Ends



Kill a Zombie with the Zombie Sword.
You can buy a Zombie Sword off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Rotten Flesh Collection VII). Any Zombie will work for this Achievement, you can just go to the Graveyard and kill one there as they are the easiest to kill.





Spoiler: Existential Revelations (Secret Achievement)



Find the Mushroom Dream in the Catacombs.
To do this, click on a mushroom in the room with Winona (credit to @Benjaminthegoat https://hypixel.net/threads/wip-new-secret-achievements.3187728/)





Spoiler: Gottagofast



Wear the full Speedster Armor.
You can buy the Speedster Armor off of the Auction House, or buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Sugar Cane Collection IX).





Spoiler: Happy New Year



Obtain a New Year's Cake from the Baker.
This Achievement can be completed by talking to the Baker during a New Year event.





Spoiler: Dullahan



Kill a Headless Horseman.
To do this, wear your best Armor Set, obtain a Spooky Candle from the Spooky Event and summon/kill the boss. Can best be done by glitching into the Dark Auction.





Spoiler: Businessman



Complete a trade with another player.
Rather self-explanatory, I won't explain anything to you for this one.





Spoiler: Oh Shiny



Mine a Glowing Block on the End Island.
Glowing Blocks are blocks of Endstone or Obsidian with glowing purple particles around them. Requires particles to be enabled. More common near the lower layers of the End.





Spoiler: King Of The Sea



Wear the Guardian Chestplate.
You can buy the Guardian Chestplate off of the Auction House, buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Prismarine Crystals Collection V).





Spoiler: No Enchants Needed



Drink a Burning Potion.
These can be found in Sand Collection VI.





Spoiler: Sacrifices Must Be Made



Salvage an item for Essence.
This can be done in the Dungeons Hub.





Spoiler: Deep Storage



[Coop or you] Unlock the level 3 Enderchest Upgrade.
The level 3 Enderchest Upgrade can be found in the Obsidian Collection (Obsidian IX).





Spoiler: Death From Above



Kill a mob using the damage from the Leaping Sword ability.
You can buy the Leaping Sword off of the Auction House, buy the materials off of the Bazaar, or craft it yourself (Spider Eye Collection IX).





Spoiler: Sea Monsters



Obtain (craft) the Sea Creature Artifact.
Can be found in the Sponge VIII collection. (This achievement could be wrong, maybe anyone who has the Achievement could tell me?)





Spoiler: Explorer



Discover all Areas on the main island.
Can be done in ~15 minutes of searching. Nothing to explain here.





Spoiler: Arcadia



[Coop or you] Place 5 unique Islands on your private world.
These can be found in various collections. Right click in a free area to place them.





Spoiler: Time To Go On Vacation



[Coop or you] Upgrade a minion with the Super Compactor 3000.
Super Compactor 3000s can be found in Cobblestone Collection X. Requires one Enchanted Block of Redstone along with all of the required Cobblestone.





Spoiler: Advanced Transportation



Sell an item using the Enchanted Hopper.
Enchanted Hoppers are Minion items which can be found in Iron Collection IX. Put this in the Minion, and you will get the Achievement after selling an item like any regular Hopper/auto seller.





This is a WIP, please don't dislike because it's unfinished. Will be finished in the next few days.

title: ✦ Dark Treasury ✦ - New Skyblock item hall!
body:
One day I thought to myself on where I was going to store some of my much rarer items. So began the construction of one of my most ambitious projects yet "The Dark Treasury" as already mentioned this was originally meant to be a place to showcase some of my more rare items, the build was too big and that was when it hit me. This wasn't just going to be a place where I displayed my rare items but a place where the community can showcase theirs too.







Currently the complex consists of two floors that being the lower floor located in the centre and then the upper floor wrapping around the lower one. Right now there are only display cases on the bottom floor as we simply do not have enough items to exceed the bottom floors capacity, the upper floor will be used if necessary. A lobby is also situated at the entrance of the building to direct players in and give them all the crucial information required about the Dark Treasury. The five pedestals at the end of the building are guild related and so are not relevant in this post. 






Simply just login to Hypixel, enter skyblock and type /visit Centranos. You will then spawn in at the lobby where you can read all about the build and it's purpose along with some rules.

- For the best visual experience ensure the following settings are correct.
- Have night vision disabled
(This can be done by either toggling the potion effect in the booster cookie menu or by removing the night vision charm/despawning your bat pet if active.)

- Have your brightness setting set to moody.
(Esc > Options > Video Settings > Brightness.)

- Full bright/ Gamma mods are disabled
(If you can see the entire treasury lit up then it wouldn't be the dark treasury XD)

If the island disallows visiting/the wooden doors are closed in the lobby this means that the Dark Treasury is currently closed for either maintenance or I personally don't want to be disturbed.






There are two ways to display your items, either you sell them to me or you donate them to me. If you sell them to me then they will just be placed in the hall. However if you donate items to me then your items shall be placed in the hall and your name/item donated shall be put on the wall of donations located in the main Dark Treasury lobby. We however must be in compliance with the Hypixel Skyblock abusive trading guidelines so each donation will be reviewed before proceeding.

Items that I am specifically looking to buy are as followed
- cluck the fish (idk if anyone has it)
- Gamebreaker (Ready to be broke XD)
- Placeable Heads

If you are interested in donating/selling items to me then either start a forum conversation with me or send a message in game. 

Have a great day/night and I hope that this is the start of something wonderful.​

title: What mob souls can you acquire using a reaper scythe?
body:
Ah, hello. To be brief, what are the limits in terms of mob souls you can acquire using a reaper scythe?

My apologies in regards to my ignorance. I've seen pictures of rogue guardians being summoned, interestingly enough, though I've heard that only undead mobs can have their souls harvested, simply put.

In addition to that, there's something I saw about how you couldn't quite capture bosses or mini-bosses, though there appears to be a scythe with a revenant on it in the auction house as of writing this, which is rather interesting.

Anyways, that concludes these paragraphs. Thank you for your time.
